column1: res­pon­die­ron Ron y Ha­rry al u[1]
column2:
replied Ron and Harry in unison

1 - uní­sono

column1: Harry estaba subiendo al alféizar cuando tío Vernon aporreó la puerta.
column2: Harry was climbing onto the windowsill when Uncle Vernon pounded on the door.

column1: Solté hilo y vi planear la cometa en el cielo.
column2: I let go of the thread/string and watched the kite glide across/soar into the sky.

column1: Fue un destacado parti[1] de Quien-tú-sabes.
column2:
He was a prominent supporter of You-Know-Who.

1 - partidario

column6:
forrado de nilón = lined with nylon
un libro forrado de pergamino = a book bound in parchment
un coche forrado de ... = a car upholstered in ...
